issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h6.Reproduce 
Using our [example code|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Communication_Between_WebViews_and_Titanium-section-29004919_CommunicationBetweenWebViewsandTitanium-Ti.AppEvents] from document, we can make a communication between WebViews and Titanium. But on IOS and Android bidirectional communication is working fine (from titanium to web view and from web view to titanium). But in mobile web from web view to titanium only working. The reverse is not working(from titanium to web view). 

h6.Test Code
See the document.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: can't communicate from Titanium to Webview
fields.environment:
1. SDK Version: (both 4.1.0.GA & 4.0.0.GA) 
2. Browser Version: 8.0(safari) 
3. IOS Version: 
a) 8.3 in Phone 6 
b) 10.10 (14A389) in OS X Yosemite(Mac)

comments.body: Marking ticket as "Won't Fix" as MobileWeb has been deprecated.
